cURL

Python

JavaScript

PHP

Go

Java

Copy

```
curl --request POST \
  --url https://app.chatwoot.com/public/api/v1/inboxes/{inbox_identifier}/contacts/{contact_identifier}/conversations/{conversation_id}/update_last_seen
```

200

401

404

#### Path Parameters

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/conversations-api/update-last-seen#parameter-inbox-identifier)

inbox\_identifier

string

required

The identifier obtained from API inbox channel

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/conversations-api/update-last-seen#parameter-contact-identifier)

contact\_identifier

string

required

The source id of contact obtained on contact create

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/conversations-api/update-last-seen#parameter-conversation-id)

conversation\_id

integer

required

The numeric ID of the conversation

#### Response

200

200401404

Last seen updated successfully
